title: Goldschmidt (Julius)
body: This German doctor, who lived in Funchal for many years, resided in Paris, where he had a large clinic, when the war broke out in 1914. Engaging in Madeiran matters, he published the pamphlets *Die lepra auf Madeira*, 1891, *Madère Étudiée comme station d'hiver*, 1880, and *Madère étudiée comme station d'hiver et d'été*, 1884. He passed away in the year 1924.
